description:
The polo is an essential. Work, travel, everyday life – it goes everywhere you go. The Captive Polo builds on the classic with a cleaner fit, performance fabrics, and a refined look that expands its range. Lightweight, stretchy and breathable, the DryTech™ fabric blends organically-grown cotton’s cool, airy comfort and polyester’s moisture management performance to make the Captive a go-to for active city commutes, weekend travel, and relaxed summer days.

Updated with organically grown cotton content.
name: Arcteryx Captive Polo - Mens
